resume.title: Mateo Bonilla | Resume
resume.name: Mateo Bonilla
resume.subtitle: Front-End Developer/Designer | Game Developer | UX/UI Designer
resume.brandSubtitle: Web Designer | Game Developer | Graphic Designer
resume.frontendDesc: Expert in creating responsive, user-friendly web interfaces using modern frameworks such as React and Angular. Skilled in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Strong focus on accessibility, performance optimization, and seamless user experiences.
resume.gameDesc: Experienced in programming gameplay mechanics and interactive systems using Unity (C#). Proficient in designing intuitive UI/UX and player feedback systems.
resume.uxDesc: UX designer and developer for web, app, and game interfaces.
resume.degreeDesc: Specialized in UX design and programming for web, apps, and games.
resume.minorDesc: Experienced in photography, Adobe Design, and graphic design, focusing on visual storytelling and communication.
resume.highschoolDesc: Strong foundation in analytical thinking and technical skills.

services.title: Mateo Bonilla | Services
services.name: Mateo Bonilla
services.subtitle: Front-End Developer | Game Developer | Graphic Designer
services.brandSubtitle: Web Designer | Game Developer | Graphic Designer
services.webDesc: Custom website design, front-end and back-end development, UX/UI design, and performance optimization. Includes e-commerce solutions, mobile-first layouts, and continuous maintenance for security and content management.
services.gameDesc: Concept design, programming mechanics and AI, 3D modeling, animation, and sound integration. Includes quality testing, performance optimization, and publishing support for distribution and marketing.
services.appDesc: UI/UX design, Android and cross-platform programming, backend API integration, and database setup. Includes testing, performance monitoring, and long-term maintenance for security and compatibility.
services.graphicDesc: Visual identity creation (logos, brand manuals), advertising design (ads, banners), packaging design, infographics, and promotional materials for both print and digital platforms.
services.videoDesc: Video editing, color correction, motion graphics, sound design, and format optimization for various platforms and purposes.
services.uxDesc: User research, wireframing, prototyping, information architecture, UI design, and usability testing for seamless user experiences.
services.freelance: I am available for freelance work
